publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7953 Anne McLaughlin: Commending the Work of Croftfoot Housing Action Group—That the Parliament commends the hard work and determination of Croftfoot Housing Action Group, based in the southside of Glasgow; notes that the action group was started by a group of local people who had real concerns about the welfare of their community; credits the action group for the work that it has done to improve the community by working with MSPs, councillors and government to feed into housing legislation; believes that community organisations such as this are the lifeblood of communities, and wishes the action group well in the work that it undertakes in the future. Supported by: Charlie Gordon*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Robert Brown*, Johann Lamont*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*
S3M-7953 Commending the Work of Croftfoot Housing Action Group (lodged on 16 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7953 Commending the Work of Croftfoot Housing Action Group (lodged on 16 February 2011) Gil Paterson*
